name: Bowlers Revenge
description:
Short stealth/strategy game about reclaiming your precious bowling ball from a group of devious Soccer Players. The level will adapt to your moves by placing down traps where you die the most, and will also lock off certain areas if you use them too often. Maneuver your way around the erratic soccer players with the help of disguises, health-kits, and your speed.

CONTROLS:

WASD - Movement

Control - Crouch

Shift - Run

Left click - Interact, Pick up or Use Items

Right click - Throw

Escape - Menu

F - Flashlight

V - Zoom

Z - Lean left

C - Lean right

CREDITS

This game makes use of the "Navigation Lite" addon by Miloš Lukić, which can be found on their GitHub. The audio was all taken from Freesound, eventually I'll make a proper credits page for the specific sounds I used. The textures are either from Google Images or textures I made ages ago and repurposed for this game. The blur effect was copy-pasted from _NoDev_. I forgot where I got the water shader from, but once I find out their links will be posted here.
